oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Willie Nelson interview excerpts - 1984-02-22
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording contains excerpts of an interview with Willie Nelson (performer), conducted on February 22, 1984.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Willie Nelson talks about enjoying flying and traveling by bus -- Nelson talks about a funny photoshoot (incomplete) -- Nelson talks about going to the white house under the influence of marijuana, dressed normally -- Nelson talks about some reasons why he left Nashville (incomplete) -- Nelson talks about his lyrical content leading his guitar playing and singing in terms of selling his music (incomplete) -- Nelson talks about changing his styles of songwriting after success (incomplete) -- Nelson talks about acting in movies not taking a huge chunk of time -- Nelson talks about songwriting for the movies he acts in -- Nelson talks about having no formal acting training -- Nelson talks (incomplete) -- Nelson talks about a lung collapsing once while swimming (incomplete) -- Nelson talks about running (incomplete) -- Nelson talks about a specific guitar -- Nelson talks (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Nelson, Willie, 1933-;
